description:
Yukie is Mamoru`s wife, and is only seen in Himatsubushi-hen. In that chapter she stays in the hospital while she is pregnant.
After praying for her husband`s safety while he is in Hinamizawa, she falls down the stairs and dies, while her child, Miyuki, survives. In the Minagoroshi-hen and Matsuribayashi-hen chapters however, it is revealed in these alternate timelines that Mamoru returned early after heeding Rika`s warning, thus preventing her death.
name: Akasaka Yukie
